items.sentence: If I could have spoken French better, I might have gotten that job.

No matter how cold it is outside, the rooms are comfortably heated.

Tom didn\'t want to admit that he was the one who broke the window.
Tom didn\'t want to give a definite answer until he talked to Mary.
Tom didn\'t want to think about what was going on behind that door.
